title: 89/282/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 April 1989 provisionally suspending approval of an establishment on the list of establishments in Brazil approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 April 1989
provisionally suspending approval of an establishment on the list of establishments in Brazil approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community
(89/282/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Approval of the Brazilian establishment Bon Beef Indústria e Comércio de Carnes SA, Vinhedo, São Paulo (veterinary approval No SIF 1602) on the list in the Annex to Decision 81/713/EEC is hereby suspended.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 April 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 382, 31. 12. 1988, p. 3.
(3) OJ No L 257, 10. 9. 1981, p. 28.
(4) OJ No C 26, 1. 2. 1989, p. 5.
